member_organisations: EBMA has as its members major bicycle and e-bike producers in the European Union.
fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Sport, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Market Economy Status China, Modernization of Trade Defense Instruments, new anti-dumping methodology
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
EBMA is a member of AEGIS Europe, an industry alliance representing 30 key industries aiming to promote manufacturing investment, innovation, jobs and growth in Europe. 
 
EBMA is one of the 130 signatories of the “Joint Industrial Declaration for an ambitious EU Industrial Strategy” and is actively involved in promoting this strategy. 
 
www.ebma-brussels.eu
goals__remit: Bicycle Advocacy, Creating many more thousands more Green Jobs in EU, Enhancing Bicycle Infrastructure in EU, Keeping, enhancing, increasing the EU Bicycle Industry in Europe with current 800 SMEs and over 90.000 workers against unfair competition
